hero.title: Find Your Dream Property in Bulgaria
hero.subtitle: Discover thousands of houses, apartments, villas, and land for sale or rent

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive real estate services to help you buy, sell, and manage properties in Bulgaria
services.companyRegistrationDesc: Full company registration service in Bulgaria for property investment
services.documentTranslationDesc: Official translation and legalization of all property documents
services.restorationDesc: Complete renovation and construction services for your property
services.houseDesignDesc: Custom architectural design and project planning for your dream home
services.governmentRepresentationDesc: Professional representation in municipality and government offices
services.utilityTransferDesc: Change ownership for electricity, water, and other utilities
services.propertySearchDesc: Dedicated property search with access to exclusive listings
services.legalConsultationDesc: Expert legal advice on property transactions and contracts
services.propertyManagementDesc: Complete management of rental properties including tenant relations
services.dueDiligenceDesc: Comprehensive property verification and legal status check
services.ctaDescription: Contact us for personalized services tailored to your specific needs

restoration.sectionDescription: Discover our completed restoration projects. We transform old houses into beautiful modern homes while preserving their unique character.
restoration.ctaDescription: Let our expert team transform your property into something extraordinary

sell.title: List Your Property
sell.subtitle: Reach thousands of buyers and renters across Bulgaria
sell.benefit1Text: Your listing will be seen by thousands of potential buyers
sell.benefit2Text: Manage your listings from your personal dashboard
sell.benefit3Text: Promote your listing to get more visibility
sell.signUpToList: Sign up now to list your property

about.title: About BulgariaEstate
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in Bulgarian real estate
about.storyText: BulgariaEstate is the leading property marketplace in Bulgaria, connecting buyers, sellers, and renters since 2020. We specialize in helping people find their dream homes along the Black Sea coast, in Sofia, Plovdiv, and throughout Bulgaria.
about.missionText: To make property search and transactions as simple and transparent as possible, while providing exceptional service to all our users.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you find your perfect property
contact.name: Your Name
